participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and outgoing, with a passion for film and meeting new people.
participant_1.background: My dad and I own over 600 movies. I want to be a movie director when I grow up. I really enjoy making friends. I play the trumpet.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and free-spirited, looking to break out of a sheltered upbringing.
participant_2.background: I plan to raise hell and sow my wild oats. I am 17. I'm about to go off to college at a very liberal school soon. I go to a Catholic high school in New England. I have lived a very sheltered life.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_2. It's nice to meet you.
You too. What's your favorite movie?
I don't know, I have a lot of favorites. I like The Shawshank Redemption, Pulp Fiction, The Godfather, The Dark Knight, and The Lord of the Rings trilogy.

Oh, those are all great movies! I love The Shawshank Redemption and The Dark Knight too. I've never seen The Godfather or Pulp Fiction, but I've heard good things about them. I've seen the Lord of the Rings trilogy, but it's been a while. I need to rewatch it soon.
You should! It's such a good trilogy.
I will. I'm excited to see how it holds up.
So, what do you want to do after you graduate?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going to college, but I'm not sure what I want to major in. I'm also considering taking a gap year to travel and explore my options.
A gap year sounds like a great idea. It'll give you some time to figure out what you want to do with your life.
I think so too. I'm excited to see what the future holds.
Me too. I'm sure you'll do great things.
